name: AP_CLAIM_PROC_CE_SAVINGS
description: This table stores code edit saving information for a service.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the transaction record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ALLOW_AMOUNT_PRIOR_CODE_EDIT
columns.description: The allowed amount of the service prior to a code edit.

columns.name: ALLOW_AMOUNT_POST_CODE_EDIT
columns.description: The allowed amount of the service after a code edit.

columns.name: COMPUTED_CODE_EDIT_SAVINGS
columns.description: The system computed code edit saving on a service for a particular code editor.

columns.name: OVERRIDE_CODE_EDIT_SAVINGS
columns.description: The overridden code edit saving on a service for a particular code editor.
